Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that the video shows the 2021 NASA mission to Mars when it actually shows computer-generated imagery from a documentary released in 2006.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the assertion that the video is from the 2021 NASA mission to Mars.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the assumption that the video is related to the 2021 NASA mission to Mars without verifying the authenticity or source of the video.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that the video is actually from a documentary released in 2006 and not from the 2021 NASA mission to Mars.
Exist alternative explanation: An alternative explanation is that the video is a clip from the IMAX documentary "Roving Mars" and is not related to the 2021 NASA mission to Mars.
